metadata.title: CVE-2014-9939 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description:
ihex.c in GNU Binutils before 2.26 contains a stack buffer overflow whenprinting bad bytes in Intel Hex objects.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9939` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gdb - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb-minimal - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb-multiarch - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb-source - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb64 - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdbserver - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdb package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3').
binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
